data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Güzelyurt, Northern Cyprus to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,646 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Güzelyurt, Northern Cyprus
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 54 believers living in the state of Güzelyurt. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 49 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Güzelyurt who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 49 neighbors who are far from you in Güzelyurt. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Güzelyurt, Northern Cyprus, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Güzelyurt.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Güzelyurt, Northern Cyprus know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.section_summary:
the state of Güzelyurt, Northern Cyprus has a population of 2,700.

We estimate Güzelyurt has 54 people who might know Jesus, 2,487 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 159 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 49 neighbors who need Jesus.
